ns2:test-suite.name: User Integration Tests 3. localAuthenticate - validates if a given userName with password and provider matches the password in DB
ns2:test-suite.title: User Integration Tests 3. localAuthenticate - validates if a given userName with password and provider matches the password in DB

test-case.name: 3.1 should fail in case the user does not exist at all in DB
test-case.title: 3.1 should fail in case the user does not exist at all in DB

test-case.name: 3.2 should fail in case the user exists in DB but has no hashedPassword field and no salt field
test-case.title: 3.2 should fail in case the user exists in DB but has no hashedPassword field and no salt field

test-case.name: 3.3 should fail in case the user has hashedPassword field but not salt field
test-case.title: 3.3 should fail in case the user has hashedPassword field but not salt field

test-case.name: 3.4 should fail in case the user has hashedPassword field but not salt field
test-case.title: 3.4 should fail in case the user has hashedPassword field but not salt field

test-case.name: 3.5 should succeed in case the details match
test-case.title: 3.5 should succeed in case the details match
